    SIGCITE 2025

    26th Annual Conference on Cybersecurity and IT Education

    The 26th ACM Annual Conference on Cybersecurity and IT Education was held on the main campus of Cosumnes River College in Sacramento, California, USA from November 6th-8th, 2025

    My research team presented three papers at the conference

    1. Popoola, S (2025). Empirical Analysis of Pull Requests for Google Summer of Code. [Slides][Paper]
    2. Popoola, S., Ashwitha V., and Nti I (2025). What do Computing Interns Discuss Online? An Empirical Analysis of Reddit Posts. [Slides][Paper]
    3. Akinremi T., Appiah J., Asadi A.,Ibitoye O., and Popoola S. (2025). Driving Factors Behind Adopting Virtual Testbeds for ICS Cybersecurity Education. [Slides][Paper]

    Computer Science and Information Technology

    Information Technolgy (IT) and Computer Science (CS) are two distinct fields within the broader realm of technology and computing. While they share some similarities, they have different focuses, goals, and areas of expertise.
